assumption: AI research tools should optimize individual researcher productivity and efficiency
hypothesis: AI research tools should optimize collective knowledge synthesis by identifying and testing literature-level assumptions
impact: This flip affects multiple research areas: literature review becomes assumption discovery, collaboration becomes assumption-testing, and reproducibility becomes assumption-validation rather than method documentation

assumption: Literature review is about finding and processing relevant papers efficiently
hypothesis: Literature review should focus on discovering and challenging implicit assumptions that span multiple papers
impact: Changes literature review from information gathering to insight generation - enables identification of novel research directions through systematic assumption inversion

assumption: Research collaboration tools should improve coordination and communication between researchers
hypothesis: Research collaboration tools should enable distributed assumption-testing and validation across research teams
impact: Transforms collaboration from task-sharing to knowledge-synthesis - enables coordinated testing of literature-level hypotheses across institutions

assumption: Reproducibility requires better documentation and experiment tracking systems
hypothesis: Reproducibility requires tools that explicitly track which assumptions were tested and validated in experiments
impact: Shifts focus from documenting what was done to validating what assumptions were tested - enables cumulative assumption validation across research community
